models.programs: Cross-entity strategic initiatives that connect to multiple Objectives, providing visibility for work that spans teams, departments, and entities.
models.programLeads: Users responsible for leading a Program. A program can have one or more co-leads.
models.activityUpdates: Recent changes and updates related to programs, displayed in the activity feed on the detailed program view.
models.linkedObjectives: Objectives that are assigned to a program. Programs track rolled-up progress from these objectives.

relationships: Each Program has one or more ProgramLeads (Users who lead the initiative)
Each Program is assigned to multiple Objectives (cross-entity strategic work)
Each Program involves multiple OrganizationalUnits (cross-entity scope)
Progress percentage is calculated by averaging the progress of all linked Objectives
Each Program has an activity feed showing recent ActivityUpdates

programs.name: Global Revenue Acceleration
programs.description: Strategic initiative to accelerate revenue growth across all entities and markets. Focus on enterprise customer acquisition, market expansion, and customer retention strategies.

linkedObjectives.title: Scale Germany entity revenue to â‚¬20M

activityUpdates.description: Added objective 'Accelerate enterprise customer acquisition' to program
Overall progress increased from 68% to 72% based on linked objective updates
Updated program description to emphasize customer retention strategies

programs.name: International Expansion
programs.description: Expand into new international markets with focus on Asia-Pacific. Build local teams, establish market presence, and acquire first customers in target regions.

activityUpdates.description: Added Sarah Chen as co-lead for the program

programs.name: Digital Transformation
programs.description: Modernize technology stack and processes to improve efficiency and scalability. Automate manual workflows, upgrade infrastructure, and implement modern development practices.

linkedObjectives.title: Enhance product quality and delivery speed

activityUpdates.description: Created new program for digital transformation initiatives
Added objective 'Enhance product quality and delivery speed'

programs.name: Customer Success Excellence
programs.description: Build world-class customer success capabilities to drive retention and expansion. Implement proactive support, customer health monitoring, and success planning processes.

activityUpdates.description: Created new program - no objectives assigned yet

programs.name: Talent Development & Culture
programs.description: Invest in employee growth, leadership development, and organizational culture. Create pathways for career progression, strengthen our values, and build high-performing teams across all entities.

linkedObjectives.title: Build a high-performing enterprise sales team

activityUpdates.description: Expanded entity scope to include Portugal
Added objective 'Build a high-performing enterprise sales team'
Added David Lee as co-lead for the program

programs.name: Product Innovation Lab
programs.description: Experimental initiative to explore emerging technologies and innovative product concepts. Fast-paced experimentation with AI/ML capabilities, new user experiences, and potential new product lines. This is a long-term strategic bet with higher risk but potentially transformative outcomes for the company.

linkedObjectives.title: Enhance product quality and delivery speed

activityUpdates.description: Created new experimental program for innovation initiatives
Linked existing objectives from Production domain
